privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Protection of your personal data
privacy.introduction: As Softiel, protecting the privacy of our visitors and customers is one of our most important priorities. This privacy policy explains what personal data we collect, how we process it, and your rights under the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (KVKK) and the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

section1.title: 1. Data Collected
section1.description: The following personal data may be collected through our website:
section1.name: Full Name
section1.cookies: Cookies (IP address, browser information, session data, etc.)
section1.note: No data is collected through artificial intelligence bots except for the information you share through the contact form.

section2.title: 2. Data Processing Purposes
section2.description: Your collected personal data is processed for the following purposes:
section2.customer: Responding to customer requests and communicating
section2.quotes: Preparing quotes and establishing business relationships
section2.analytics: Performing analytics and performance measurements (through Google Analytics)

section3.title: 3. Cookies and Analytics
section3.description: Our website only uses cookies within the scope of Google Analytics service. These cookies are processed to improve user experience and measure site performance. You can manage your cookie settings from your browser options.

section4.title: 4. Data Retention Period
section4.description: Your personal data is stored as long as the customer relationship continues. When the relevant business relationship ends, your data will be deleted or anonymized.

section5.description: Under KVKK and GDPR, you have the following rights over your personal data:

section6.note: Other than this, your data is not transferred to any third country.

section7.description: As Softiel, we take the necessary administrative and technical security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.

cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.subtitle: Information about cookies used on our website
cookie.introduction: As Softiel, we use cookies to improve the experience of users who visit our website, measure site performance, and improve our services. This Cookie Policy has been prepared within the scope of the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (KVKK) and the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

section1.title: 1. What is a Cookie?
section1.description: Cookies are small text files that are saved to your browser or device when you visit a website. Thanks to these files, the site can remember your preferences and improve your user experience.

section2.title: 2. Types of Cookies Used
section2.essentialDesc: These are cookies necessary for the site to perform its basic functions. Functions such as logging in and submitting forms do not work without these cookies.
section2.functionalDesc: It personalizes the site for you by remembering your preferences (e.g., language selection, display settings).
section2.analyticsDesc: It anonymously collects users' movements on the site (traffic analysis, pages visited, browsing times) through Google Analytics. This helps us improve site performance and user experience.
section2.marketingDesc: It helps us measure the effectiveness of advertising and campaign activities by analyzing user behavior.

section3.title: 3. Purposes of Cookie Usage
section3.description: The collected data is used for the following purposes:
section3.measure: Measuring visitor count and traffic sources,

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
section4.description: Only third-party cookies within the scope of Google Analytics service are used on our site. These cookies collect anonymous statistical data and do not disclose your personal identity information.

section5.title: 5. Cookie Storage Duration
section5.description: Cookies are stored for the duration of the session and are automatically deleted when the browser is closed.

section6.title: 6. Cookie Management
section6.description: Users can reject cookies or delete existing cookies through browser settings. We remind you that if you disable cookies, some parts of the site may not work correctly.

section7.title: 7. Legal Basis and Compliance
section7.description: Cookie usage is carried out in accordance with legal obligations within the scope of KVKK and GDPR. Users can exercise their rights regarding cookies at any time and request information from us.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.description: You can contact us for your questions about our Cookie Policy:
